Blog.post: Wouldn't it be cool if there was a barbie that you could wax. She'd grow hair like everywhere and you'd have a waxing kit and you could wax her legs and give her a brazillian....I reckon that would be choice....I want one. Bunny Custard

At the Cairns Show they have showbags right. They have Barbie, Spiderman, The Simpsons, every single one you could imagine....but why don't they have a fucking "Erotic" showbag. I don't want fucking chocolate and stuffed animal toys. I want handcuffs, whips and body oil. I was very disapointed that I didn't get the showbag I wanted and I think that the showbag elves should be burned to death if they don't make an erotic showbag for next year. Bunny Custard

My school is holding a fashion parade and they have beachwear, daywear, formalwear, sleepwear....but what about the fucking erotic section? I wanna wear the crotchless undies and cupless bra, so everyone can see my huge nipples. Thoughts? Bunny Custard

I'm not talking about sex this time. I'm talking about something fairly serious. Yes Bunny has a serious side to her aswell. I cry sometimes, I bleed when I knife cuts into me. Anyway. Why do people hit you with things that you arent expecting? I don't mean hit as in literally but you know, hit you with information that confuses you in the worst way and keeps you awake for ages at night. I'm really confused at the moment. I know I shouldn't be but I am. I don't know how to get rid of my confusion...thoughts anyone? You get back to me. Bunny Custard

Went back to school today...it was shit. School is so depressing. The socialising is cool but the rest is just bbbllllaaaaahhhhh vomit. I don't really have that much to say really, that's what school does to me...if my braincells had wrists, they'd slit them. Bunny Custard
